select new com.jshx.zdwxyyjcz.entity.ComDanEme(t.id, t.areaName, t.companyName, t.dangerName, t.emergencyName) from ComDanEme t where t.delFlag = 0
and t.deptId in (:deptCodes)
and t.id in (:ids)
and t.companyId = :companyId
and t.areaId = :areaId
and t.companyName like :companyName
and t.emergencyName like :emergencyName
and t.dangerName like :dangerName
and t.createUserID= :createUserId
and charindex(t.companyId,:companmyIds) >0
and ( t.companyName like :searchLike or t.dangerName like :searchLike or t.emergencyName like :searchLike)
order by t.createTime desc
